solution_line_template: Grover will earn ${price_per_mask} x {masks_per_box} = $<<{price_per_mask}*{masks_per_box}={earnings_per_box}>>{earnings_per_box} for each box.
So, he will earn ${earnings_per_box} x {num_boxes} = $<<{earnings_per_box}*{num_boxes}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings} after selling all the face masks.
Therefore, his total profit will be ${total_earnings} - ${cost_of_boxes} = $<<{total_earnings}-{cost_of_boxes}={total_profit}>>{total_profit}.
